render_info.source_dynamic: select ers.EmulationAndRewardSubjectID as EmulationAndRewardSubjectID, er.Event as AwardingPeriod, ers.Code as Code, ers.Name as Name, ers.LatestTitle as LatestTitle, ers.LatestEmulationAndRewardUnit as LatestEmulationAndRewardUnit, ers.Unit as Unit, CASE ers.Type WHEN 1 THEN N'Cá nhân' WHEN 2 THEN N'Đơn vị' END AS Type, erh.AwardingType, ers.Email as Email, ers.Mobile as Mobile, CASE ers.Deleted WHEN 0 THEN N'Lưu' WHEN 1 THEN N'Đã xóa' END AS Deleted, ers.Version as Version, ers.CreatedBy as CreatedBy, ers.CreatedDTG as CreatedDTG, ers.UpdatedBy as UpdatedBy, ers.UpdatedDTG as UpdatedDTG from [dbo].[er_EmulationAndRewardHistory] erh join [dbo].[er_EmulationAndReward] er on erh.EmulationAndRewardID = er.EmulationAndRewardID join [dbo].[er_EmulationAndRewardSubject] ers on erh.EmulationAndRewardSubjectID = ers.EmulationAndRewardSubjectID
